summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Alarko Enerji renewable energy investment platform (iteration 2). All 22 backend API tests passed (100%) and frontend UI tests passed (~95%). Key new features verified: 1) Withdrawal creates pending request WITHOUT deducting balance - only deducted on admin approval, 2) Account page (/account) with profile info and password change, 3) Admin can edit user info via Düzenle button, 4) Navbar dropdown has Hesabım link.
critical_code_review_comments: All code follows best practices with proper error handling
data-testid attributes present on interactive elements for testing
Proper Turkish language throughout the UI
Withdrawal flow correctly updated - balance only deducted on admin approval
seed_data_creation: Backend tests created test users with 'TEST_' or unique UUID prefixes for isolation
context_for_next_testing_agent: All core features working. Backend APIs fully functional. Key verified flows: 1) Admin login → redirects to /admin panel, 2) Account page at /account shows profile and password change, 3) Withdrawal page shows admin approval warning and creates pending transaction without balance deduction, 4) Admin users page has Düzenle button to edit user info, 5) Admin transactions page shows approve/reject for pending transactions, 6) Projects page shows 4 GES/RES projects with filtering. Charts appear on dashboard only when user has investments.

features_tested.landing_page: PASSED - Hero section, projects, calculator, plans, benefits, testimonials, FAQ with Turkish text
features_tested.login: PASSED - Admin login with admin@alarkoenerji.com / admin123
features_tested.account_page: PASSED - Profile info (name, email, phone, KYC status, registration date) and password change form
features_tested.password_change_api: PASSED - POST /api/auth/change-password validates current password and new password length
features_tested.dashboard_page: PASSED - Stats, charts (when investments exist), active investments section
features_tested.withdrawal_page: PASSED - Creates pending withdrawal WITHOUT deducting balance, shows admin approval warning text
features_tested.admin_panel: PASSED - Dashboard with stats, users list, transactions
features_tested.admin_edit_user: PASSED - Düzenle button opens dialog with name/email/phone fields
features_tested.admin_transactions: PASSED - Shows approve/reject buttons for pending transactions
features_tested.withdrawal_approval_flow: PASSED - Admin approval deducts balance only at approval time
features_tested.navbar_hesabim: PASSED - User dropdown menu includes Hesabım option
features_tested.projects_page: PASSED - Shows 4 GES/RES projects with filtering tabs
features_tested.project_detail_page: PASSED - Shows project info, funding progress, investment button
